Posts.Content: Hi I am 18 days out and I have a seroma  I have to have it drained every 2nd days but it does not hurt.  It is getting smaller now and feeling less sore.  I would suggest getting it checked out staff are so supportive and explain everything in great detail.  Hope all goes well and you feel better soon. Margo xx
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Just want to say that I love reading the posts and find it so helpful  Having my operation on the 17th and then RT.  How long is it after the op that you start RT anyone???? Thanks in advance Margox
Posts.Title: My Treatment Plan

Posts.Content: Just want to send a special hug, I know it's not much but you sound like you need one.:)
